programmes.show_description: Documentary following Louis Theroux as he travels to San Francisco where a group of pioneering medical professionals are helping children with gender dysphoria. Ep22
...States: Love Without Limits. Louis travels to Portland, Oregon, and discovers a whole spectrum of non-traditional family set-ups: some that work and some that have been pushed to breaking point.
The players face a colossal spinning wheel as they attempt to win a fortune with some help from Peter Andre, Rob Beckett and Patricia Bright.
Shopping from Home.
You Don't Know Jack: The top-rated domestic sitcom with former Citizen Smith and Extras guest star, Robert Lindsay. Michael has a new friend in school and Susan has a new admirer.
What's up, Docklands?: Putting the beef into the domestic sitcom. Ben and Susan decide to help out some friends by flat sitting their brand-new Docklands apartment.
Luck Be a Lady Tonight: Popular domestic sitcom. Susan suggests Roger should make Abi jealous, and Ben despairs.
First Past the Post: Family fun with the eccentric Harper family, starring Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker. With a burst of civic pride, Susan decides to run for the council.
My Will Be Done: Zoe Wanamaker is one half of a quirky couple in the popular sitcom. Ben thinks about his will and Nick takes a job at a funeral director's.
My Fair Charlady: Here's something most Mums dream about in the popular sitcom. Susan employs a cleaner, who turns out to be such a treasure that she takes over the cooking as well.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Sunny, Bertie & Edith: Bouncy Golden Retriever puppy Bertie has a dislocated hip, Tibetan terrier Sunny is almost immobile, and Springer Spaniel Edith has a bulging spinal disc.
Domino, Diamond, Willow & Luigi: Pop superstar Will Young brings in two of his rescue dogs, Domino and Diamond, while supermodel Yasmin Le Bon's French Bulldog Willow collapses at home.
Monty, Odin & Maya: Caucasian Shepherd Odin has Wobbler Syndrome, Toy Poodle Monty needs a total hip replacement, and Malamute Husky Cross Maya needs to get back on her four feet again.
Poppy, Keira & Bella: In this puppy special, Noel treats Border Terrier Kiera, and we look back at Springer Spaniel Poppy, who had one of the worst leg deformities Noel had ever seen.
Pretzel, Bran & Wobble: In this rescue special, we meet abandoned kitten Pretzel with severely twisted back legs, and look back at Wobble the Whippet and three-legged German Shepherd Bran.
The West Midlands crews treat a pensioner whose heart rate is so erratic they are worried he might have a heart attack on the way to the hospital.
Crews from West Midlands Ambulance Service attend a diabetic who has collapsed at home, reassure the wife of a man with heart problems and keep up the spirits of a woman with womb cancer.
A girl has an operation to have squints in both eyes realigned, a man has his infected gall bladder removed and an ex-police officer is having a grommet inserted in her ear.
A woman has an operation to repair the hernia she suffered while giving birth and a four-year-old's ear blockage is so bad he needs a general anaesthetic to it sucked out.
Every Student Counts: Student midwives Ruby and Grace are in the second year of their studies and are now learning on the job. Summah and her friend Lilli enjoy cocktails and a takeaway.

programmes.show_name: Stacey Dooley: Face to Face with Armageddon
programmes.show_description: The journalist meets Americans prepping for an uncertain future, all with different concerns - from climate change and natural disasters to civil unrest.
Louis Theroux explores relationships complicated by medical conditions. Here, he visits one of America's best schools for autism.

programmes.show_name: Louis Theroux: Altered States: Take My Baby
programmes.show_description: Louis Theroux explores open adoption in California, where women hand over their babies at birth to adoptive families paying tens of thousands of dollars for the privilege.
Three more contestants place their fate in the hands of The Wheel and a pool of celebrity experts as they try to win a fortune.
Shopping from Home.
The Everything Mystery Box contains lamb, sugar snap peas, labneh, Pedro Jimenez sherry, fenugreek, parsley, bacon and garlic.

Bromsgrove: Nick Knowles and the team create a safe and inspiring home space for the family of a two-year-old with a very rare lung condition.
Bolton: The team head to Bolton to help the Taylor-Mann family, whose nine-year-old son William has severe autism.
Bromley: Nick Knowles and the team create a safe and inspiring home space for the Newcombes, who have a two-year-old son with a very rare lung condition.

Popular property renovation series. The Scott twins help Michelle and her daughter Felicia find a tranquil new home for their family.
Property renovation series hosted by Drew and Jonathan Scott. The twins help ambitious newlyweds Michelle and Jon, who are determined to find a forever home of their own.
Bromsgrove: Nick Knowles and the team create a safe and inspiring home space for the family of a two-year-old with a very rare lung condition.
Hermes & Dave: Noel faces one of his greatest ever practical and ethical challenges as he tries to provide Hermes, a one-legged tortoise, with three new prosthetic feet.
Simba, Tulee & Poppy: A small Cavachon has a broken leg and a serious heart condition, while a Labrador needs help with badly-formed hips and a nervous Basset Hound has a spinal problem.
Luca, Ivor & Bow: The team offer cutting-edge treatment for Luca, a long-suffering four-year-old Springer spaniel with a painful elbow. Plus, a leaky Labrador puppy needs surgery.
Another visit to the maternity ward at Liverpool Women's Hospital. Childhood friends Karra and Danny await the arrival of their third child.
Maternity series which pulls on the heartstrings. Meet two dads-to-be who want to overcome their difficult upbringings by creating blissful childhoods for their sons.
